title: following provisions of the Electoral Reform Act 2022 (No. 30 of 2022) shall
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Reform Act 2022
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Reform Act 2022 

(Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited electoral reform act 2022 (commencement) order 2022

title: following provisions of the Electoral Reform Act 2022 (No. 30 of 2022) shall
heading: 2. The 13th day of October 2022 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 13th day of October 2022 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Electoral Reform Act 2022 (No. 30 of 2022) shall 
come into operation: 

(a) Part 1, other than – 

(i) 

section 3, 

(ii) paragraphs (h) to (k) of subsection (1) of section 4, and 

(iii) subsections (3) and (4) of section 4; 

(b) Chapter 1 of Part 2 and sections 9, 10, 11, 12, 19 and 21 of 

Chapter 3 of Part 2; 

(c) Part 3 (other than section 98); 

(d) Part 6; 

(e) Part 8. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

13 October, 2022. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 14th October, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [512] 3

title: following provisions of the Electoral Reform Act 2022 (No. 30 of 2022) shall
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

In exercise of the powers conferred on the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage by section 1(5) of the Electoral Reform Act 2022 
(No. 30 of 2022), this Order appoints 13 October 2022 as the day on which 
certain provisions of that Act come into operation. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [512]
